T01sukhvylu:470: tasya khalu punar ānandāmitābhasya tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho, yasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgṛhītum ;
T01sukhvylu:471: iyatyaḥ śrāvakakoṭya, iyanti śrāvakakoṭīśatāni, iyanti śrāvaka-
T01sukhvylu:473: iyanti biṃbarāṇi, iyanti nayutāni, iyanty ayutāni,
T01sukhvylu:474: iyanti akṣobhyāṇi, iyantyo vivāhā, iyanti śrotāṃsi, iyantyo
T01sukhvylu:475: jāyā, iyanty aprameṇeyāṇi, iyanty asaṃkhyeyāni, iyanty
T01sukhvylu:477: tad yathānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣur ṛddhivaśitāprāptaḥ sa ākāṃkṣan trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau yāvanti tārārūpāṇi tāni sarvāṇy ekarātriṃ divena gaṇayed, evaṃrūpānāṃ ca rddhimatāṃ koṭīnayutaśatasahasraṃ bhavet, te varṣakoṭī-
T01sukhvylu:478: nayutaśatasahasram ananyakarmaṇo 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya prathamaṃ śrāvakasannipātaṃ gaṇayeyus, tair gaṇayadbhiḥ śatatamo 'pi bhāgo na gaṇito bhavet ; sahasratamo
T01sukhvylu:479: 'pi, śatasahasratamo 'pi, yāvat kalām apy, upamām apy, upaniśām
T01sukhvylu:481: tad yathānanda mahāsamudrāc caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇy āvedhena tiryag aprameyāt, kaścid eva puruṣaḥ śatadhābhinnayā
T01sukhvylu:482: vālāgrakoṭyaikam udakabindum abhyutkṣipet, tat kiṃ manyase, ānanda, katamo bahutaro, yo vā śatadhābhinnayā
T01sukhvylu:483: vālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣipta eka udakabindur, yo vā mahāsamudre
T01sukhvylu:485: bhagavan mahāsamudrasya parīttaṃ bhavet. kim aṅga punar, yaḥ śatadhābhinnayā vālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣipta eka udakabinduḥ.
T01sukhvylu:486: bhagavān āha : tad yathā sa eka udakabindur ;
T01sukhvylu:487: iyantaḥ sa prathamasannipāto 'bhūt, tair maudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhir gaṇayadbhis tena varṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṇa gaṇitaṃ bhaved, yathā mahāsamudre 'pskandho 'vaśiṣṭa,
T01sukhvylu:488: evam agaṇitaṃ draṣṭavyam. kaḥ punar vādo dvitīyatṛtīyādīnāṃ
T01sukhvylu:489: śrāvakasannipātādīnām. evam anantāparyantas tasya bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho, yo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeya ity eva saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti.
T01sukhvylu:492: iyanti vā kalpā, iyanti vā kalpaśatāni, iyanti vā kalpasahasrāṇi,
T01sukhvylu:493: iyanti vā kalpaśatasahasrāṇi, iyatyo vā kalpakoṭya, iyanti vā kalpakoṭīśatāni, iyanti vā kalpakoṭīsahasrāṇi, iyanti vā kalpakoṭī-
T01sukhvylu:495: atha tarhy ānandāparimitam eva tasya bhagavata āyuṣpramāṇam
T01sukhvylu:496: aparyantam. tena sa tathāgato 'mitāyur ity ucyate.
T01sukhvylu:497: yathā cānandeha lokadhātau kalpasaṃkhyā kalpagaṇanā prajñaptikasaṃketas,
T01sukhvylu:498: tathā sāṃprataṃ daśakalpās tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasyotpannasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya.
T01sukhvylu:499: tasya khalu punar ānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātur, ṛddhā ca, sphītā ca, kṣemā ca, subhikṣā
T01sukhvylu:500: ca, ramaṇīyā ca, bahudevamanuṣyākīrṇā ca. tatra khalv apy ānanda lokadhātau na nirayāḥ santi, na tiryagyonir,
T01sukhvylu:501: na pretaviṣayo, nāsurāḥ kāyā, nākṣaṇopapattayaḥ ; na ca tāni ratnāni loke pracaranti, yāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau
T01sukhvylu:503: sā khalv ānanda sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ surabhinānāgandhasamīritā,
T01sukhvylu:506: te cānanda ratnavṛkṣā nānāvarṇā, anekavarṇā, anekaśata-
T01sukhvylu:507: sahasravarṇāḥ : santi tatra ratnavṛkṣāḥ suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇa-
T01sukhvylu:508: mayāḥ ; santi rūpyavarṇā rūpyamayāḥ ; santi vaiḍūryavarṇā vaiḍūryamayāḥ ; santi sphaṭikavarṇāḥ sphaṭikamayāḥ ;
T01sukhvylu:509: santi musāragalvavarṇā musāragalvamayāḥ ; santi lohitamuktāvarṇā lohitamuktāmayāḥ ; santy aśmagarbhavarṇā aśmagarbhamayāḥ.
T01sukhvylu:510: santi kecid dvayo ratnavṛkṣayoḥ suvarṇasya rūpyasya ca. santi trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya ca. santi caturṇāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya ca. santi pañcānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya ca. santi ṣaṇṇāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musāragalvasya lohitamuktāyāś ca. santi saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya musālagalvasya lohitamuktāyā,
T01sukhvylu:513: skandhaviṭapaśākhāpattrapuṣpāni phalāni raupyamayāni ; raupyamayānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ rūpyamayāny eva mūlaskandhaviṭapa-
T01sukhvylu:514: śākhāpattrapuṣpāni phalāni vaiḍūryamayāni ; vaiḍūryamayānāṃ vṛkṣānāṃ vaiḍūryamayāni mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpattra-
T01sukhvylu:515: puṣpāṇi phalāni sphaṭikamayāni ; sphaṭikamayānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ sphaṭikamayāny eva mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhāpattra-
T01sukhvylu:516: puṣpāṇi phalāni musāragalvamayāni ; musāragalvamayānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ musāragalvamayāny eva mūlaskandhaviṭapaśākhā-
T01sukhvylu:517: pattrapuṣpāṇi phalāni lohitamuktāmayāni ; lohitamuktāmayānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ lohitamuktāmayāny eva
T01sukhvylu:521: keṣāṃcid ānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ suvarṇamayāni mūlāni, raupyamayāḥ
T01sukhvylu:524: aśmagarbhamayāṇi phalāni ; keṣāṃcid ānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ rūpyamayāni
T01sukhvylu:527: aśmagarbhamayāṇi puṣpāṇi, suvarṇamayāni phalāni ; keṣāṃcid ānanda vṛkṣāṇāṃ vaiḍūryamayāni mūlāni, sphaṭikamayāḥ
T01sukhvylu:533: pattrāṇi, raupyamayāni puṣpāṇi, vaiḍūryamayāni phalāni ; keṣāṃcid ānanda vṛkṣānāṃ musāragalvamayāni mūlāni, lohita-
T01sukhvylu:535: mayāḥ śākhā, raupyamayāni pattrāṇi, vaiḍūryamayāni puṣpāṇi,
T01sukhvylu:539: sphaṭikamayāni puṣpāṇi, musāragalvamayāni phalāni ; keṣāṃcid ānanda vṛkṣāṇām aśmagarbhamayāni mūlāni, suvarṇamayāḥ
T01sukhvylu:547: pattrapuṣpaphalāni mṛdūni sukhasaṃsparśāni sugandhīni ; vātena preritānāṃ ca teṣāṃ valgumanojñanirghoṣo
T01sukhvylu:549: evaṃrūpair ānanda saptaratnamayair vṛkṣaiḥ saṃtataṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ samantāc ca kadalīstambhaiḥ saptaratnamayai ratnatālapaṇktibhiś cānuparikṣiptaṃ, sarvataś ca hemajālapraticchannaṃ,
T01sukhvylu:553: santi yāvad daśayojanapramāṇāni. sarvataś ca ratnapadmāt
T01sukhvylu:554: ṣaṭtriṃśadraśmikoṭīsahasrāṇi niścaranti. sarvataś ca raśmimukhāt ṣaṭtriṃśadbuddhakoṭīsahasrāṇi niścaranti ; suvarṇa-
T01sukhvylu:556: yāni pūrvasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā, sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti. evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu dikṣv adha ūrdhvam anuvidikṣu cānāvaraṇe loke
T01sukhvylu:558: tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre sarvaśaḥ kālaparvatā na santi, sarvato ratnaparvatāḥ. sarvaśaḥ sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ, sarvaśaś cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ parvata-
T01sukhvylu:559: rājāno, mahāsamudrāś ca na santi. samantāc ca tad
T01sukhvylu:562: evam ukta āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat : ye punas te bhagavaṃś cāturmahārājakāyikā devāḥ sumerupārśva-
T01sukhvylu:563: nivāsinas trāyastriṃśā vā sumerumūrdhni nivāsinas, te kutra pratiṣṭhitāḥ. bhagavān āha : tat kiṃ manyase, ānanda,
T01sukhvylu:564: ye ta iha sumeroḥ parvatarājasyopari yāmā devās, tuṣitā
T01sukhvylu:567: devā, yāvad akaniṣṭhā devāḥ, kutra te pratiṣṭhitā iti. āha :
T01sukhvylu:570: vipākaḥ, karmābhisaṃskāro ; na punar buddhānāṃ bhagavatām acintyaṃ buddhādhiṣṭhānam. kṛtapuṇyānāṃ ca sattvānām
T01sukhvylu:572: na me 'tra bhagavan kācit kāṃkṣā vā, vimatir vā,
T01sukhvylu:573: vicikitsā vā. api tu khalv aham anāgatānāṃ sattvānāṃ
T01sukhvylu:574: kāṃkṣāvimativicikitsāṃ nirghātāya tathāgatam etam arthaṃ paripṛcchāmi. bhagavān āha : sādhu sādhv ānandaivaṃ te
T01sukhvylu:576: tasyāṃ khalv ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nānāprakārā nadyaḥ pravahanti. santi tatra mahānadyo
T01sukhvylu:581: tāsāṃ cānanda koṭīśatasahasrāṅgasaṃprayuktasya divyasaṅgītisaṃmūrcchitasya tūryasya kuśalaiḥ
T01sukhvylu:582: tāvan manojñanirghoṣo niścarati. yathārūpas tāsāṃ mahā-
T01sukhvylu:583: nadīnāṃ nirghoṣo niścarati, gambhīra, ājñeyo, vijñeyo, 'nelaḥ
T01sukhvylu:586: yas teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śrotrendriyānāṃ bhāsam āgacchanti.
T01sukhvylu:587: tāsāṃ khalu punar ānanda mahānadīnām ubhayatas tīrāṇi nānāgandhavṛkṣaiḥ saṃtatāni, yebhyo
T01sukhvylu:588: puṣpamañjaryo 'valaṃbante. tatra ye sattvās tesu nadītīreṣv ākāṃkṣanti, divyāṃ nirāmiṣāṃ ratikrīḍāṃ cānubhavituṃ,
T01sukhvylu:589: teṣāṃ tatra nadīṣv avatīrṇānāṃ ākāṃkṣatāṃ gulphamātraṃ vāri saṃtiṣṭhante ; ākāṃkṣatāṃ jānumātraṃ
T01sukhvylu:591: divyāś ca ratayaḥ prādurbhavanti. tatra ye sattvā ākāṃkṣanti :
T01sukhvylu:592: śītaṃ vāri bhavatv iti, teṣāṃ śītaṃ bhavati ; ye ākāṃkṣanty :
T01sukhvylu:593: uṣṇaṃ bhavatv iti, teṣām uṣṇaṃ bhavati ; ye ākāṃkṣanti :
T01sukhvylu:594: śītoṣṇaṃ bhavatv iti, teṣāṃ śītoṣṇam eva tad vāri bhavaty anusukham.
T01sukhvylu:601: vikardamāḥ, suvarṇavālikāsaṃstīrṇāḥ. tatra yadā te sattvā ākāṃkṣanti : īdṛśā asmākam abhiprāyāḥ paripūryantām iti,
T01sukhvylu:602: tadā teṣāṃ tādṛśā evābhiprāyā dharmyāḥ paripūryante. yaś
T01sukhvylu:603: cāsāv ānanda tasya vāriṇo nirghoṣas tāvad manojño niścarati,
T01sukhvylu:604: yena sarvāvat tad buddhakṣetram abhijñāpyate. tatra ye sattvā nadītīreṣu sthitā ākāṃkṣanti : māsmākam ayaṃ śabdaḥ
T01sukhvylu:605: śrotrendriyābhāsam āgacchann iti, teṣāṃ sa divyasyāpi
T01sukhvylu:607: nāgacchati. yaś ca yaś ca yathārūpaṃ śabdam ākāṃkṣanti śrotuṃ, sa tathārūpam evaṃ manojñaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti ; tad yathā ; buddhaśabdaṃ, dharmaśabdam,
T01sukhvylu:617: sarvaśaś cānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv akuśalaśabdo nāsti ; sarvaśo nīvaraṇaśabdo nāsti ; sarvaśo 'pāyadurgativinipāta-
T01sukhvylu:618: śabdo nāsti ; sarvaśo duḥkhaśabdo nāsti ; aduḥkhāsukha-
T01sukhvylu:619: vedanāśabdo 'pi tāvad ānanda tatra nāsti ; kutaḥ punar duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaśabdo vā bhaviṣyati.
T01sukhvylu:620: tad anenānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvaty ucyate saṃkṣiptena, na punar vistareṇa. kalpo 'pi parikṣayaṃ
T01sukhvylu:622: na tv eva śakyaṃ teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ paryanto 'dhigantum.
T01sukhvylu:623: tasyāṃ khalu punar ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājaniṣyante vā, sarve ta evaṃrūpeṇa
T01sukhvylu:627: evaṃrūpaiś ca sarvopabhogaparibhogaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ ; tad yathāpi nāma devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ.
T01sukhvylu:628: na khalu punar ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sattvā audārikaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāram āharanti. api tu khalu punar yathārūpam evāhāram ākāṃkṣanti, tathārūpam āhṛtam eva
T01sukhvylu:629: saṃjānanti. prīṇitakāyāś ca bhavanti, prīṇitagātrāḥ. na teṣāṃ bhūyaḥ kāye prakṣepaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. te prīṇitakāyās tathārūpāni gandhajātāny ākāṃkṣanti, tādṛśair eva gandhajātair divyais tad-buddhakṣetraṃ sarvam eva nirdhūpitaṃ
T01sukhvylu:630: bhavati. tatra yas taṃ gandhaṃ nāghrātukāmo bhavati,
T01sukhvylu:631: tasya sarvaśo gandhasaṃjñāvāsanāpi na samudācarati. evaṃ ye yathārūpāṇi gandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvaja-
T01sukhvylu:632: patākātūryāṇy ākāṃkṣanti, teṣāṃ tathārūpair evaṃ taiḥ sarvaṃ tad-buddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ
T01sukhvylu:633: te yādṛśāni cīvarāṇy ākāṃkṣanti nānāvarṇāny anekaśata-
T01sukhvylu:634: sahasravarṇāni, teṣāṃ tādṛśair eva cīvararatnaiḥ samaṃ tad-
T01sukhvylu:635: buddhakṣetraṃ parisphuṭaṃ bhavati ; prāvṛtam eva cātmānaṃ
T01sukhvylu:637: te yathārūpāṇy ābharaṇāny ākāṃkṣanti, tad yathā : śīrṣābharaṇāni
T01sukhvylu:639: vā, yad idaṃ : makuṭāni, kuṇḍalāni, kaṭakāṃ, keyūrāṃ,
T01sukhvylu:641: mekhalāḥ, suvarṇajālāni, sarvaratnakaṃkaṇījālāni, te tathārūpair ābharaṇair anekaratnaśatasahasrapratyuptaiḥ
T01sukhvylu:642: tad-buddhakṣetraṃ paśyanti sma. yad idam : ābharaṇavṛkṣa-
T01sukhvylu:643: vastrais taiś cābharaṇair alaṃkṛtam ātmānaṃ saṃjānanti.
T01sukhvylu:644: te yādṛśaṃ vimānam ākāṃkṣanti, yad varṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ,
T01sukhvylu:647: vinyastaratnaparyaṅkaṃ, tādṛśam eva vimānaṃ teṣāṃ purataḥ prādurbhavati. te teṣu manobhinirvṛteṣu vimāneṣu saptāpsaraḥsahasraparivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā viharanti, krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti.
T01sukhvylu:648: na ca tatra lokadhātau devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ vā nānātvam asti, anyatra saṃvṛtivyavahāreṇa devā manuṣyā veti saṃkhyāṃ
T01sukhvylu:649: gacchati. tad yathānanda, rājñaś cakravartinaḥ purato
T01sukhvylu:650: manuṣyahīno manuṣyaṣaṇḍako na bhāsate, na tapati, na virocate,
T01sukhvylu:651: na bhavati viśārado, na prabhāsvara, evam eva devānāṃ
T01sukhvylu:652: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ purataḥ śakro devendro na bhāsate,
T01sukhvylu:653: na tapati, na virocate, yad idam : udyānavimānavastrābharaṇair,
T01sukhvylu:654: ādhipatyena vā, rddhyā vā, prātihāryeṇa vaiśvaryeṇa vā ; na tu khalu punar dharmābhisamayena
T01sukhvylu:655: vā. tatrānanda yathā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartina evaṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā draṣṭavyāḥ.
T01sukhvylu:656: tasyāṃ khalu punar ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāhna-
T01sukhvylu:658: samākulā vāyavo vānti, yenātra ratnavṛkṣāṃś citrān, darśanīyān,
T01sukhvylu:661: yato bahūni puṣpaśatāni tasyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ prapatanti manojñagandhāni darśanīyāni. taiś ca puṣpais
T01sukhvylu:662: tadbuddhakṣetraṃ samantāt saptapauruṣaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati. tad yathāpi nāma kaścid eva puruṣaḥ kuśalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puṣpasaṃstaraṃ saṃstṛṇuyād, ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhāṃ samaṃ racayet sucitraṃ darśanīyam, evam etad buddhakṣetraṃ taiḥ puṣpair nānāgandhavarṇaiḥ samantāt saptapauruṣaṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati. tāni ca puṣpajātāni mṛdūni kācalindikasukhasaṃsparśāny ; aupamyamātreṇa yāni nikṣipte
T01sukhvylu:663: pāde caturaṅgulam eva namanty, utkṣipte pāde caturaṅgulam
T01sukhvylu:664: evānamanti. nirgate punaḥ pūrvāhnakālasamaye, tāni puṣpāni niravaseṣam antardhīyante.
T01sukhvylu:666: bhavaty, aparikliṣṭais taiḥ pūrvapuṣpaiḥ. tataḥ punar
T01sukhvylu:667: api samantāc caturdiśaṃ vāyavo vānti, ye pūrvavad abhinavāni
T01sukhvylu:668: puṣpāṇy abhiprakiranti. yathā pūrvāhna eva madhyāhne,
T01sukhvylu:669: 'parāhne kālasamaye, saṃdhyāyāṃ, rātryāḥ prathame yāme, madhyame paścime ca yāme. taiś ca vātair vāyadbhir nānāgandhaparivāsitais te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ santa, evaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhavanti sma, tad yathāpi nāma nirodhasamāpanno
T01sukhvylu:673: prajñaptir api nāsti. sarvaśo rātridivaprajñaptir api
T01sukhvylu:676: tasyāṃ khalu punar ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau kāle divyagandhodakameghā abhipravarṣanti. divyāni sarva-
T01sukhvylu:677: varṇikāni kusumāni, divyāni saptaratnāni, divyaṃ candana-
T01sukhvylu:679: vimānāni, divyāni vitānāni dhriyante, divyāni ratnacchatrāṇi sacāmarāṇy ākāśe dhriyante. divyāni vādyāni pravādyante.
T01sukhvylu:681: tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre ye sattvā upapannā utpadyanta upapatsyante, sarve te niyatāḥ samyaktve yāvan nirvāṇāt. tat kasya hetoḥ. nāsti tatra dvayo
T01sukhvylu:682: rāśyor vyavasthānaṃ prajñaptir vā, yad idam : aniyatyasya vā mithyātvaniyatasya vā. tad anenāpy ānanda paryāyeṇa sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatīty ucyate saṃkṣiptena, na vistareṇa.
T01sukhvylu:683: kalpo 'py ānanda parikṣayet, sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau sukhakāraṇeṣu parikīrtayamāneṣu ; na ca teṣāṃ sukhakāraṇānāṃ
T01sukhvylu:685: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imā gāthā abhāṣata :
T01sukhvylu:692: kṣayaṃ na gacchet pratibhā teṣāṃ prakāśayantāna tha varṇamālā.(2)
T01sukhvylu:693: ye lokadhātūṃ paramāṇusadṛśāṃ cchindeya bhindeya rajāṃś ca kuryāt,
T01sukhvylu:694: ato bahū uttari lokadhātū pūretva dānaṃ ratanehi dadyāt.(3)
T01sukhvylu:695: na tā kalāṃ pi upamā pi tasya puṇyasya bhontī pṛthulokadhātavaḥ,
T01sukhvylu:696: yal lokadhātūya sukhāvatīye śrutvaiva nāma bhavatīha puṇyaṃ (4)
T01sukhvylu:700: tasmād dhi śrutvā vimatiṃ vinodayed, iti.(5)
T01sukhvylu:702: tasya khalu punar ānanda bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya
T01sukhvylu:703: daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaṅgānadīvālukāsamā buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayante, varṇaṃ bhāṣante, yaśaḥ
T01sukhvylu:704: prakāśayanti, guṇam udīrayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ. ye kecit sattvās tasya 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇvanti, śrutvā cāntaśa ekacittotpādam apy adhyāśayena prasādasahagatam utpādayanti, sarve te 'vaivarttikatāyāṃ
T01sukhvylu:706: ye cānanda kecit sattvās taṃ tathāgataṃ punaḥ punar ākārato manasīkariṣyanti, bahuparimitaṃ ca kuśalamūlam
T01sukhvylu:707: avaropayiṣyanti, bodhāya cittaṃ pariṇāmya tatra ca lokadhātāv
T01sukhvylu:710: 'nekabhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sthāsyati. tatas te taṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasannacittāḥ santi, tatraiva sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapadyate. ya ānandākāṃkṣata,
T01sukhvylu:711: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā, kim ity ahaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme
T01sukhvylu:712: tam amitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyeyam iti, tenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyādhyāśayapatitayā saṃtatyā tasmin buddhakṣetre cittaṃ saṃpreṣyopapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayitavyāni.
T01sukhvylu:713: ye punas taṃ tathāgataṃ na bhūyo manasīkariṣyanti, na ca bahuparimitaṃ kuśalamūlam abhīkṣṇam
T01sukhvylu:714: tatra ca buddhakṣetre cittaṃ saṃpreṣayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ tādṛśenaiva so 'mitābhas tathāgato 'rhan
T01sukhvylu:715: varṇasaṃsthānārohapariṇāhena bhikṣusaṃghaparivāreṇa, tādṛśa eva buddhanirmito maraṇakāle purataḥ sthāsyati, te tenaiva tathagatadarśanaprasādālambanena samādhināpramuṣitayā smṛtyā cyutās, tatraiva buddhakṣetre pratyājaniṣyanti.
T01sukhvylu:716: ye punar ānanda sattvās taṃ tathāgataṃ daśacittotpādāṃ samanusmariṣyanti ; spṛhāṃś ca tasmin buddhakṣetre utpādayiṣyanti ;
T01sukhvylu:717: gambhīreṣu ca dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu tuṣṭiṃ pratilapsyante, na vipatsyante, na viṣādam āpatsyante, na saṃsīdam āpatsyante ; 'ntaśa ekacittotpādenāpi taṃ tathāgataṃ
T01sukhvylu:719: te 'pi svapnāntaragatās tam amitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ drakṣyanti ;
T01sukhvylu:722: imaṃ khalv ānandārthavasaṃ saṃpaśyantas, te tathāgatā daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsu lokadhātusu tasyāmitābhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayanto, varṇān
T01sukhvylu:723: ghoṣayantaḥ, praśaṃsām abhyudīrayanti. tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre daśabhyo digbhya ekaikasyāṃ
T01sukhvylu:724: diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvās tam amitābhaṃ tathāgatam upasaṃkrāmanti darśanāya, vandanāya,
T01sukhvylu:725: paripraśnīkaraṇāya ; taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tāṃś ca buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadaviśeṣān
T01sukhvylu:726: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imam evārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā paridīpayann imā gāthā abhāṣata :
T01sukhvylu:729: yato hi te āgami buddha vanditum saṃbodhisattvā amitāyu nāyakaṃ.(1)
T01sukhvylu:732: tatha dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu buddhāna kṣetrā diśatāsu tattakāḥ,
T01sukhvylu:733: yato yato āgami buddha vanditum saṃbodhisattvā amitāyu nāyakaṃ.(3)
T01sukhvylu:740: te puṣpapuṭāhi samokiranti udagracittā atulāya prītaye,
T01sukhvylu:743: taiḥ puṣpapuṭā iti kṣipta tatra cchatraṃ tadā saṃsthihi yojanāśatāṃ,
T01sukhvylu:750: asmehi pī lābha sulabdha pūrvā yad āgatasya ima buddhakṣetraṃ.
T01sukhvylu:756: amitā ca āyur, amitaś ca saṃghaḥ.(10)
T01sukhvylu:757: smitaṃ karontī amitāyu nāthaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśatkoṭīnayutāni arciṣāṃ,
T01sukhvylu:758: ye niścaritvā mukhamaṇḍalābhaḥ sphuranti kṣetrāṇi sahasrakoṭīḥ.(11)
T01sukhvylu:763: uttiṣṭhate buddhasuto mahāyaśā nāmnātha so hi avalokiteśvaraḥ :
T01sukhvylu:764: ko hetur atra bhagavan, ko pratyayaḥ,
T01sukhvylu:769: ye bodhisattvā bahulokadhātuṣu sukhāvatīṃ prasthita buddhapaśyanā,
T01sukhvylu:774: divyaṃ ca cakṣus, tatha śrotra divyaṃ,
T01sukhvylu:777: mama hy ayaṃ praṇidhir abhūṣi pūrva.
T01sukhvylu:780: sa me aya praṇidhi prapūrṇa śobhanā,
T01sukhvylu:796: tasya khalu punar ānanda bhagavato 'mitāyuṣas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhivṛkṣaḥ ṣoḍasayojanaśatāny uccaitvenāṣṭau yojanaśatāny abhipralambitaśākhāpattrapalāśaḥ
T01sukhvylu:801: divyasamatikrāntaḥ, suvarṇasūtrābhipralambito, rūcakahāro ratnahāro vajrāhāraḥ kaṭakahāro lohitamuktāhāro nīlamuktāhāraḥ, siṃhalatāmekhalākalāparatnasūtrasarva-
T01sukhvylu:806: tasya khalu punar ānanda bodhivṛkṣasya vātasamīritasya yaḥ śabdaghoṣo niścarati, so 'parimāṇān lokadhātūn abhivijñāpayati.
T01sukhvylu:808: śrotrāvabhāsam āgacchati, teṣāṃ śrotrarogo na pratikāṃkṣitavyo,
T01sukhvylu:810: cintyāmāpyāparimāṇānabhilāpyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhivṛkṣaś cakṣuṣābhāsam āgacchati, teṣāṃ cakṣūrogo na pratikāṃkṣitavyo,
T01sukhvylu:811: yāvad bodhiparyantam. ye khalu punar ānanda sattvās tato bodhivṛkṣād gandhaṃ jighranti, teṣāṃ yāvad bodhiparyantaṃ na jātu ghrāṇarogaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyaḥ. ye sattvās tato bodhivṛkṣāt phalāny āsvādayanti, teṣāṃ yāvad bodhiparyantaṃ na jātu jihvārogaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyaḥ.
T01sukhvylu:812: ye sattvās tasya bodhivṛkṣasyābhayā sphuṭā bhavanti,
T01sukhvylu:813: teṣāṃ yāvad bodhimaṇḍaparyantaṃ na jātu kāyarogaḥ
T01sukhvylu:814: pratikāṃkṣitavyaḥ. ye khalu punar ānanda sattvās taṃ
T01sukhvylu:815: bodhivṛkṣaṃ dharmato nidhyāyanti, teṣāṃ tatropādāya yāvad
T01sukhvylu:816: bodhiparyantaṃ na jātu cittavikṣepaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyaḥ. sarve ca te sattvāḥ sahadarśanāt tasya bodhivṛkṣasyāvaivarttikāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante ; yad utānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tisraś ca kṣāntīḥ pratilabhante, yad idaṃ : ghoṣānugām anulomikāṃ anutpattikadharmakṣāntiṃ ca ; tasyaivāmitāyuṣas tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānādhiṣṭhānena, pūrvajinakṛtādhikāratayā,
T01sukhvylu:819: tatra khalu punar ānanda ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ pratyājāyante pratyājaniṣyante vā, sarve ta ekajātipratibaddhās
T01sukhvylu:821: sthāpayitvā praṇidhānavaśena ye te bodhisattvā mahāsiṃhanādanāditā,
T01sukhvylu:824: tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre ye śrāvakās te vyomaprabhā, ye bodhisattvās te yojanakoṭīśatasahasraprabhāḥ
T01sukhvylu:825: sthāpayitvā dvau bodhisattvau, yayoḥ prabhayā sā lokadhātuḥ satatasamitaṃ nityāvabhāsasphuṭā.
T01sukhvylu:826: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat :
T01sukhvylu:827: kiṃ nāmadheyau bhagavan tau satpuruṣau bodhisattvau
T01sukhvylu:828: mahāsattvau. bhagavān āha : ekas tayor ānandāvalokiteśvara
T01sukhvylu:829: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo, dvitīyaḥ sthāmaprāpto nāma. ita evānanda buddhakṣetrāc cyutvā tatropapannau.
T01sukhvylu:830: tatra cānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātāḥ,
T01sukhvylu:835: tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ
T01sukhvylu:837: dharmāṇo, yāvad bodhiparyantaṃ. sarve ca te tatropādāya na jātv ajātismarā bhaviṣyanti, sthāpayitvā tathārūpeṣu kalpasaṃkṣobheṣu ye pūrvasthānapraṇihitāḥ pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu vartamāneṣu, yadā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
T01sukhvylu:838: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati, tad yathāpi nāma mamaitarhi.
T01sukhvylu:839: tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ
T01sukhvylu:840: pratyājātāḥ, sarve ta ekapurobhaktenānyalokadhātūṃ gatvānekani buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇy upatiṣṭhanti, yāvac cākāṃkṣanti buddhānubhāvena te yathā cittam utpādayanty :
T01sukhvylu:842: cīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantītūryasaṃgītivādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāma iti, teṣāṃ sahacittotpādāt tathārūpāṇy eva sarvapūjāvidhānāni pāṇau prādurbhavanti. te taiḥ puṣpair yāvad vādyais teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu pūjāṃ kurvanto bahvapa-
T01sukhvylu:843: rimāṇāsaṃkhyeyaṃ kuśalamūlam upacinvanti. sacet punar ākāṃkṣanty : evaṃrūpāḥ puṣpapuṭāḥ pāṇau prādurbhavanti,
T01sukhvylu:844: teṣāṃ sahacittotpādān nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā nānāgandhā divyāḥ puṣpapuṭāḥ pāṇau prādurbhavanti. te tais tathārūpaiḥ
T01sukhvylu:845: puṣpapuṭaiḥ tān buddhān bhagavato 'vakiranti sma, abhyavakiranty,
T01sukhvylu:846: abhiprakiranti. teṣāṃ ca yaḥ sarvaparīttaḥ puṣpapuṭa utsṛṣṭo, daśayojanavistāram puṣpacchatraṃ
T01sukhvylu:847: upary antarīkṣe dvitīye cānutsṛṣṭe, na prathamo dharaṇyāṃ prapatati. santi tatra puṣpapuṭā ya utsṛṣṭāḥ santo
T01sukhvylu:852: udāraṃ ca cittaudbilyaṃ pratilabhyante ; te bahv aparimitam
T01sukhvylu:853: asaṃkhyeyaṃ ca kuśalamūlam avaropya, bahūni buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇy upasthāyaikapūrvāhnena punar api sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau pratiṣṭhante, tasyaivāmitāyuṣas
T01sukhvylu:856: tasmin khalu punar ānanda buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ
T01sukhvylu:857: pratyājātāḥ, sarve te sarvajñatāsahagatām eva dharmakathāṃ kathyanti. na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ kācit
T01sukhvylu:860: prakrāmantas tāś cānupekṣā evaṃ prakrāmanti, na sāpekṣāḥ sarvaśas caiṣām evaṃ cittam nāsti.
T01sukhvylu:861: tatra khalu punar ānanda sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau ye sattvāḥ pratyājātā, nāsti teṣām anyātakasaṃjñā, nāsti svakasaṃjñā,
T01sukhvylu:862: nāsti mamasaṃjñā, nāsti vigraho, nāsti vivādo, nāsti
T01sukhvylu:863: virodho, nāsti asamacittaḥ ; samacittās te, hitacittā, maitracittā,
T01sukhvylu:871: buddhacakṣur niṣpādayanto, deśayanto, dyotayanto, vistāreṇa prakāśayanto ; 'saṅgajñānam abhinirharantas,
T01sukhvylu:874: hārāhārakuśalā, nayānayasthānakuśalā ; lokikīṣu kathāsv anapekṣā viharanti. lokottarābhiḥ kathābhiḥ sāraṃ
T01sukhvylu:882: anadhimāninaḥ ; sumerusamā jñāne 'bhyudgatāḥ ; sāgarasamā buddhyākṣobhyā ; candrasūryaprabhātikrāntāḥ
T01sukhvylu:889: padmasadṛśāḥ sarvalokānupaliptayā ; kālānusārimahāmeghasadṛśā dharmābhigarjanatayā ; mahāvṛṣṭisadṛśā dharmasalilābhivarṣaṇatayā ;
T01sukhvylu:891: mahānāgasadṛśāḥ paramasudāntacittatayā ; bhadrāśvājāneyasadṛśāḥ suvinītatayā ; siṃhamṛgarājasadṛśā vikramavaiśāradyāsaṃtrastatayā ;
T01sukhvylu:895: pakṣisadṛśāḥ saṃnicayasthānatayā ; garuḍadvijarājasadṛśāḥ parapravādividhvaṃsanatayā ; udumbarapuṣpasadṛśā durlabhotpattyarthitayā ; nāgavat susamāhitā, avikṣiptā, ajihmendriyā ;
T01sukhvylu:898: atṛptā dharmaparyeṣṭau ; vaiḍūryasadṛśāḥ śīlena ; ratnākarāḥ śrutena ; mañjusvarā mahādharmadundubhighoṣena ; mahādharmabherīṃ parāghnanto ; mahādharmaśaṅkham āpūrayanto ;
T01sukhvylu:903: viraktā, dhīrā, vīrā, dhaureyā, dhṛtimanto, hrīmanto, 'sādṛśyā,
T01sukhvylu:912: akhilā, atulā, arajasaḥ, sahitā, udārā, ṛṣabhā, hrīmanto,
T01sukhvylu:916: īdṛśā ānanda tasmin buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
T01sukhvylu:917: saṃkṣiptena. vistareṇa punaḥ sacet kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrasthitikenāpy āyuṣpramāṇena tathāgato nirdiśed, na tv eva
T01sukhvylu:918: śakyaṃ teṣāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ guṇaparyanto 'dhigantum. na ca tathāgatasya vaiśāradyopacchedo bhavet. tat kasya hetoḥ. ubhayam apy etad ānandācintyam atulyam, yad idam : teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ guṇās tathāgatasya cānuttaraṃ prajñāpratibhānam.
T01sukhvylu:919: api cānanda uttiṣṭha paścānmukho bhūtvā, puṣpāṇy avakīryāñjaliṃ pragṛhya, praṇipata. eṣāsau dig, yatra sa bhagavān
T01sukhvylu:921: yāpayati, dharmaṃ ca deśayati ; virajo viśuddho, yasya taṃ nāmadheyam anāvaraṇaṃ daśadiśi loke vighuṣṭam ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto varṇayanti,
T01sukhvylu:924: etad avocat : icchāmy ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tam amitābham amitaprabham amitāyuṣaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ draṣṭum, tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
T01sukhvylu:925: bahubuddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlān. samanantarābhāṣitā cāyuṣmatānandeneyaṃ vāk, atha tāvad eva
T01sukhvylu:926: so 'mitābhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svapāṇitalāt tathārūpāṃ prabhāṃ prāmuñcat, yayedaṃ koṭīśatasahasratamaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭam abhūt.
T01sukhvylu:927: tena khalv api samayena sarvatra koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ,
T01sukhvylu:928: ye kecit kālaparvatā vā, ratnaparvatā vā,
T01sukhvylu:930: vā, bhittayo vā, stambhā vā, vṛkṣagahanodyānavimānāni vā divyamānuṣyakāni, tāni sarvāṇi tasya tathāgatasya tayā prabhayābhinirbhinnāny abhūvan, samabhibhūtāni.
T01sukhvylu:931: tad yathāpi nāma puruṣo vyāmamātrake sthito dvitīyaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyavekṣata āditye 'bhyudgata ; evam evāsmin buddhakṣetre bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā devanāgayakṣa-
T01sukhvylu:932: gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāś ca tasyāṃ velāyām adrākṣus tam amitābhaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ
T01sukhvylu:935: bibhrājamānaṃ, taṃ ca mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ, taṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ, yad idaṃ buddhānubhāvena tasyāḥ prabhayāḥ pariśuddhatvāt.
T01sukhvylu:936: tad yatheyaṃ mahāpṛthivy ekodakajātā bhavet, tatra na vṛkṣā, na parvatā, na dvīpā, na tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo,
T01sukhvylu:937: na nadīśvabhraprapātāḥ prajñāyeran, anyatraikārṇavībhūtamahāpṛthivy aikā syāt ; evam eva tasmin buddhakṣetre nāsty anyat kiṃcil liṅgaṃ vā, nimittaṃ vānyatraiva vyāmaprabhāḥ
T01sukhvylu:938: śrāvakās, te ca yojanakoṭīśatasahasraprabhā bodhisattvāḥ, sa ca bhagavān amitābhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas,
T01sukhvylu:939: taṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ taṃ ca bodhisattvagaṇam abhibhūya,
T01sukhvylu:941: tena khalv api samayena tasyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvāḥ śrāvākadevamanuṣyāś ca sarve ta imāṃ lokadhātuṃ,
T01sukhvylu:942: śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena parivṛtaṃ paśyanti sma, dharmaṃ ca deśayantam.
T01sukhvylu:943: tatra khalu bhagavān ajitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āmantrayate sma : paśyasi tvam ajitāmuṣmin buddhakṣetre guṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadam ; upariṣṭāś cāntarīkṣa ārāmaramaṇīyāni,
T01sukhvylu:946: adhastāc ca dharaṇitalam upādāya, yāvad akaniṣṭhabhavanād,
T01sukhvylu:949: nānādvijasaṃghaniṣevitam. āha : paśyāmi bhagavan, bhagavān āha : paśyasi punas tvam ajitaitān aparān dvijasaṃghān
T01sukhvylu:950: sarvabuddhakṣetrān buddasvareṇābhijijñāpayanti, yenaite bodhisattvā nityam avirahitā buddhānusmṛtyā. āha : paśyāmi
T01sukhvylu:951: bhagavan. bhagavān āha : paśyasi tvam ajitātra buddhakṣetre amūn sattvān yojanaśatasahasrakeṣu vimāneṣv abhirūḍhān,
T01sukhvylu:953: bhagavān āha : tat kiṃ manyase 'jita ; asti kiṃcin nānātvaṃ devānāṃ vā paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sukhāvatyām lokadhātau manuṣyaṇāṃ vā. āha : ekam apy ahaṃ bhagavan nānātvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi. yāvad maharddhikā atra
T01sukhvylu:954: sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ. bhagavān āha : paśyasi punas tvam ajita tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv ekeṣāṃ manuṣyāṇām udāreṣu padmeṣu garbhāvāsam. āha ; tad yathāpi nāma bhagavan trayaśtriṃśā devā yāmā devā vā, pañcāśadyojanakeṣu
T01sukhvylu:955: vā, yojanaśatikeṣu vā, pañcayojanaśatikeṣu vimāneṣu praviṣṭāḥ krīḍanti, ramanti, paricārayanti ; evam evāhaṃ bhagavan atra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv ekeṣāṃ manuṣyāṇām udārapadmeṣu garbhāvāsaṃ paśyāmi.
T01sukhvylu:956: santi khalu punar atra bhagavan sattvā ya upapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti. tat ko 'tra bhagavan
T01sukhvylu:957: hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo, yad anye punar garbhāvāse prativasanti ;
T01sukhvylu:958: anye punar upapādukāḥ paryaṅkaiḥ padmeṣu prādurbhavanti.
T01sukhvylu:959: bhagavān āha : ye te 'jita bodhisattvā anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
T01sukhvylu:960: sthitāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye vicikitsām P58
T01sukhvylu:962: teṣām atra garbhāvāso bhavati. ye punar nirvicikitsāś cchinnakāṃkṣāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye kuśalamūlāny avaropayanti, buddhānāṃ bhagavatām asaṅgajñānam avakalpayanty abhiśraddhadhaty adhimucyante ; tatropapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti. ye te 'jita bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anyatrabuddhakṣetrasthāś cittam utpādayanty amitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya darśanāya,
T01sukhvylu:963: na vicikitsām utpādayanti, na kāṃkṣanty asaṅgabuddhajñānaṃ,
T01sukhvylu:964: svakucalamūlaṃ cābhiśraddhadhati, teṣām aupapādukānāṃ paryaṅkaiḥ padmeṣu prādurbhūtānāṃ muhūrtamātreṇaivaivaṃrūpaḥ kāyo bhavati, tad yathānyeṣāṃ ciropapannānāṃ sattvānām.
T01sukhvylu:966: prajñāparīttatāṃ, yatra hi nāma pañcavarṣaśatāni parihīṇā bhavanti buddhadarśanād, bodhisattvadarśanāt,
T01sukhvylu:967: dhārmasaṃkathyāt ; kuśalamūlacaryāyāḥ parihīṇā bhavanti sarvakuśalamūlasaṃpatter, yad idaṃ
T01sukhvylu:969: tad yathājita rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhānābhiṣiktasya bandhanāgāraṃ bhavet, sarvasauvarṇavaiḍūryapratyuptam,
T01sukhvylu:975: tatra tasya rājñaḥ putraḥ kenacid eva kṛtyena prakṣipto P59
T01sukhvylu:976: jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayair nigaḍair baddho bhavati. tasya ca tatra paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ syād,
T01sukhvylu:979: darśanīyaḥ. sa tatrābhiniṣaṇṇo vābhinipanno vā bhavet. bahu cāsyānekavidhaṃ śucipraṇītaṃ pānabhojanaṃ
T01sukhvylu:980: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita ; udāras tasya rājaputrasya sa paribhogo bhavet. āha : udāro bhagavan. bhagavān āha : tat kiṃ manyase 'jita ; api tv āsvādayet, sa tan nigamayed vā,
T01sukhvylu:981: tena vā tuṣṭiṃ vidyāt. āha : no hīdaṃ bhagavan. api tu khalu punar yena vyapanītena rājñā tatra bandhanāgāre prakṣipto bhavet, sa tato mokṣam evākāṃkṣayet. abhijātān kumārān amātyān stryāgārān śreṣṭhino gṛhapatīn koṭṭarājño vā paryeṣed, ya enaṃ tato bandhanāgārāt parimocayeyuḥ.
T01sukhvylu:982: kiṃ cāpi bhagavaṃs tasya kumārasya tatra bandhanāgāre
T01sukhvylu:983: nābhiratiḥ. nātra parimucyate, yāvan na rājā prasādam upadarśayati.
T01sukhvylu:984: bhagavān āha : evam evājita, ye te bodhisattvāḥ
T01sukhvylu:985: vicikitsāpatitāḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropayanti, kāṃkṣanti buddhajñānam asamasamajñānaṃ, kiṃ cāpi te buddhanāmaśravaṇena,
T01sukhvylu:986: tena ca cittaprasādamātreṇātra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapadyante. na tu khalv aupapādukāḥ padmeṣu paryaṅkaiḥ prādurbhavanti. api tu padmeṣu garbhāvāse
T01sukhvylu:989: na pratikūlaṃ manasaḥ pravartate. api tu khalu punaḥ pañca varṣaśatāni virahitā bhavanti buddhadarśanena,
T01sukhvylu:992: tatra nābhiramante, na tuṣṭiṃ vidanti. api tu khalu punaḥ pūrvāparādhaṃ kṣapayitvā, te bhūyas tataḥ paścān niṣkrāmanti.
T01sukhvylu:993: na caiṣāṃ tato niṣkrāmatāṃ niṣkramaḥ prajñāyata, ūrdhvam adhas tiryag vā.
T01sukhvylu:994: paśyājita ; yatra hi nāma pañcabhir varṣaśatair bahūni
T01sukhvylu:995: buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇy upasthātavyāni, bahvasaṃkhyeyāprameyāni ca kuśalamūlāny avaropayitavyāni ca syuḥ.
T01sukhvylu:996: buddhadharmāś ca parigṛhītavyāḥ. tat sarvaṃ vicikitsādoṣeṇa
T01sukhvylu:999: tasmāt tarhy ajita ; bodhisattvair nirvicikitsair bodhāya
T01sukhvylu:1000: cittam utpādya, kṣipraṃ sarvasattvahitasukhādhānāya sāmarthāpratilambhārthaṃ, sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattaye kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayitavyāni, yatra bhagavān amitāyus tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
T01sukhvylu:1001: evam ukte, 'jito bodhisattvo bhagavantam etad avocat :
T01sukhvylu:1002: kiyantaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvā ito buddhakṣetrāt
T01sukhvylu:1003: pariniṣpannā, anyeṣāṃ vā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante. bhagavān āha :
T01sukhvylu:1004: ito hy ajita buddhakṣetrād dvāsaptatikoṭīnayutāni bodhisattvānāṃ
T01sukhvylu:1007: śatasahasrāvaropitaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ. kaḥ punar vādas, tataḥ parīttataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ.
T01sukhvylu:1008: duṣprasahasya tathāgatasyāntikād aṣṭādaśakoṭīnayutāni bodhisattvānāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante ;
T01sukhvylu:1009: pūrvāntare digbhāge ratnākaro nāma tathāgato viharati.
T01sukhvylu:1011: jyotiṣprabhasya tathāgatasyāntikād dvāviṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1012: amitaprabhasya tathāgatasyāntikāt pañcaviṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1013: lokapradīpasya tathāgatasyāntikāt ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1014: nāgābhibhuvas tathāgatasyāntikāt catuḥṣaṣtibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyām lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1015: virajaprabhasya tathāgatasyāntikāt pañcaviṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1016: siṃhasya tathāgatasyāntikād aṣṭādaśabodhisattvasahasrāṇi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1017: śrīkūṭasya tathāgatasyāntikād ekāśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1018: narendrarājasya tathāgatasyāntikād daśabodhisattvakoṭīnayutāni sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1019: balābhijñasya tathāgatasyāntikād dvādaśabodhisattvasahasrāṇi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1020: puṣpadhvajasya tathāgatasyāntikāt pañcaviṃśatir vīryaprāptā bodhisattvakoṭya ekaprasthānasaṃsthitā ekenāṣṭāhena navanavatikalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi paścānmukhīkṛtya yāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante ;
T01sukhvylu:1021: jvalanādhipates tathāgatasyāntikād dvādaśabodhisattvakoṭyaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante
T01sukhvylu:1022: vaiśāradyaprāptasya tathāgatasyāntikād ekonasaptatir bodhisattvakoṭyo yāḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyante ;
T01sukhvylu:1025: etenājita paryāyeṇa paripūṛṇakalpakoṭīnayutaṃ nāmadheyāni parikīrtayeyaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānām, yebhyas te bodhisattvā
T01sukhvylu:1026: upasaṃkrāmanti sukhāvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ tam amitābhaṃ tathāgataṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ, na ca śakyaḥ
T01sukhvylu:1028: paśyājita kiyat sulabdhalābhās te sattvā ye 'mitābhasya
T01sukhvylu:1030: śroṣyanti, napi te sattvā hīnādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti,
T01sukhvylu:1031: ye 'ntaśa ekacittaprasādam api tasmin tathāgate pratilapsyante,
T01sukhvylu:1033: tasmāt tarhy ajita ; ārocayāmi vaḥ, prativedayāmi vaḥ,
T01sukhvylu:1035: trisāhasramahāsāhasram api lokadhātum agniparipūṛṇām avagāhyātikramyaikacittotpādam api vipratisāro na kartavyaḥ.
T01sukhvylu:1036: tat kasya hetoḥ. bodhisattvakoṭyo hy ajitāśravaṇād eṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmaparyāyāṇāṃ vivartante
T01sukhvylu:1040: ārabdhavyam. antaśa ekarātrim divasam apy, eka-
T01sukhvylu:1041: godohamātram apy antaśaḥ, pustakagatāvaropitam api kṛtvā
T01sukhvylu:1042: sulikhito dhārayitavyaḥ, śastṛsaṃjñā ca tatrotpādāya kartavyā,
T01sukhvylu:1043: icchadbhiḥ kṣipram aparimitān sattvān avaivarttikāṃś cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ, taṃ ca tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭum. ātmanaś ca visiṣṭāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇālaṃkāravyūhasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhītum iti.
T01sukhvylu:1044: api tu khalv ajita ; atyarthaṃ sulabdhalābhās te sattvā
T01sukhvylu:1045: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ, pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā, buddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, yeṣām anāgate 'dhvani, yāvat saddharmapralope vartamāna ima evaṃrūpā udārā dharmaparyāyāḥ
T01sukhvylu:1050: vācayiṣyanti, paryavāpsyanti, parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
T01sukhvylu:1051: bhāvanābhiratāś ca bhaviṣyanty, antaśo likhitvā pūjayiṣyanti, bahu ca te puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti, yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartum.
T01sukhvylu:1052: iti hy ajita yat tathāgatena kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tan mayā.
T01sukhvylu:1053: yūṣmābhir idānīṃ nirvicikitsair yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. mā saṃśaya tam asaṅgam anāvaraṇaṃ buddhajñānam. mā bhūt sarvākārāvaropeta-
T01sukhvylu:1054: ratnamayapadmabandhanāgārapraveśaḥ. durlabho hy ajita buddhotpādaḥ, durlabhā dharmadeśanā,
T01sukhvylu:1057: asya khalu punar ajita dharmaparyāyasya mahatīṃ parīndanāṃ karomy avipranāśāya. mā buddhadharmāṇām antardhānāya parākramiṣyatha. mā tathāgatājñāṃ ksobha-
T01sukhvylu:1059: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām imā gāthā abhā-
T01sukhvylu:1062: ye tu te śūra siddhārthāḥ te śroṣyanti imāṃ girāṃ.(1)
T01sukhvylu:1063: dṛṣṭo yaiś ca hi saṃbuddho lokanātha prabhaṃkaraḥ,
T01sukhvylu:1064: sa gauravaiḥ śruto dharmaḥ prītiṃ prāpsyanti te parāṃ.(2)
T01sukhvylu:1065: na śakta hīnebhi kuśīdadṛṣtibhiḥ buddhāna dharmeṣu prasāda vinditum.
T01sukhvylu:1068: yathāndhakāre puruṣo hy acakṣuḥ mārgaṃ na jāne kutu saṃprakāśayet.
T01sukhvylu:1069: sarve tathā śrāvaka buddhajñāne ajānakāḥ kiṃ punar anyasattvāḥ.(4)
T01sukhvylu:1074: yadi sarvasattvāḥ sugatā bhaveyuḥ viśuddhajñānā paramakovidā,
T01sukhvylu:1075: te kalpakoṭīr atha vāpi uttare ekasya buddhasya guṇān katheyuḥ.(6)
T01sukhvylu:1076: atrāntare nirvṛta te bhaveyuḥ prakāśyamānā bahukalpakoṭīḥ,
T01sukhvylu:1087: ya īdṛśāṃ dharma śruṇitvā śreṣṭhāṃ labhyanti prītiṃ sugataṃ smarantaḥ,
T01sukhvylu:1089: ye buddhā bodhāya janenti cchandam, iti.(10)
T01sukhvylu:1090: asmin khalu punar dharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāne dvādaśānāṃ sattvanayutakoṭīnāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddhaṃ, caturviṃśatyā koṭībhir anāgāmiphalaṃ
T01sukhvylu:1092: cittāni vimuktāni. pañcaviṃśatyā bodhisattvakoṭībhir anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ. devamānuṣikāyāś ca prajāyāś catvāriṃśatkoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇām anutpattipūrvāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni sukhāvatyupapattaye ca kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni, bhagavato
T01sukhvylu:1094: sarve te tatrotpādyānupūrveṇa mañjusvarā nāma tathāgatā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣūpapatsyante. aśītiś ca nayutakoṭyo dīpaṅkareṇa tathāgatena labdhakṣāntikā avaivartyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher, amitāyuṣaiva tathāgatena paripācitāḥ
T01sukhvylu:1097: tasyāṃ ca velāyām ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitaḥ. vividhāni ca prātihāryāṇi
T01sukhvylu:1098: saṃdṛśyanti, jānumātraṃ ca mandaravapuṣpaiḥ pṛthivyāṃ saṃstṛtam abhūt. divyamānuṣikāni ca tūryāṇi saṃvāditāny
T01sukhvylu:1099: abhūvan. anumodakāśabdena ca yāvad akaniṣṭhabhavanaṃ vijñaptam abhūt.
T01sukhvylu:1100: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā, ajito bodhisattvo mahāsattva
T01sukhvylu:1101: āyuṣmāṃś cānandaḥ, sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣyāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam
